alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 4:34PM AKDT until November 04 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Storm total accumulation 3 to 7 inches, heaviest east of Fairbanks. * WHERE...Middle Tanana Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow has tapered off in Fairbanks. Fairbanks can expect light snow with little additional accumulation tonight and Friday. Snow will continue east of Fairbanks through Friday morning. Areas east of Fairbanks can expect a storm total of 5 to 7 inches by Friday morning when the snow tapers off. Very light snow with little additional accumulation will continue through Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
